title: Bloomingville 12" H Carved Mango Wood Candleholder (Holds 4" Candle) Pillar Holder, Brown
features: Beautifully display a 4-inch pillar candle on top
Can also be a base for a small potted plant
Place on a decorative placemat the same color as the candle you insert
description: This brown mango wood candleholder will be a great accent to the room décor with its gorgeous design. It will hold a four inch pillar candle but also makes a great pedestal for a small potted plant. Pair it with a decorative placemat underneath the same color as the candle displayed on top.
